# G2 Middle East: Strategic Advisory & Government Relations

## About G2 Middle East

G2 Middle East is an elite strategic advisory firm specializing in government relations, cultural intelligence, and high-stakes stakeholder engagement across the Middle East region. We provide confidential counsel to organizations navigating complex political, regulatory, and cultural landscapes.

## Core Services

### Strategic Advisory

We deliver sophisticated strategic counsel for organizations operating in or entering Middle Eastern markets. Our approach combines deep regional expertise with global best practices, enabling clients to make informed decisions in complex environments.

### Government Relations

Our government relations practice facilitates engagement with policymakers, regulatory bodies, and government entities across the Middle East. We provide strategic insight into policy developments, regulatory frameworks, and government decision-making processes.

### Cultural Intelligence

Cultural intelligence is the foundation of successful operations in the Middle East. We provide comprehensive cultural mapping, stakeholder analysis, and strategic guidance to ensure clients navigate cultural nuances effectively and build sustainable relationships.

### Digital Sovereignty

We advise organizations on digital sovereignty frameworks, data localization requirements, and technology policy across Middle Eastern jurisdictions. Our expertise spans regulatory compliance, risk assessment, and strategic positioning in evolving digital landscapes.

### High-Stakes Engagement

We provide confidential strategic counsel for sensitive negotiations, crisis management, and complex stakeholder situations. Our team operates with absolute discretion to protect client interests in high-pressure environments.

## Leadership

### Tim Jacobs - Regional Chief Operating Officer

Tim Jacobs serves as Regional COO for G2 Middle East, bringing extensive experience in strategic operations and government relations across the Middle East. His expertise spans regulatory affairs, stakeholder engagement, and organizational strategy in complex markets.

Tim has led numerous high-stakes engagements for multinational corporations, government entities, and private organizations navigating Middle Eastern markets. His approach emphasizes cultural intelligence, strategic patience, and long-term relationship building.

## Geographic Focus

G2 Middle East maintains active operations across the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) states, with particular expertise in:

- United Arab Emirates (UAE)
- Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA)
- Qatar
- Kuwait
- Oman
- Bahrain

We also provide strategic counsel on engagement with Jordan, Egypt, and broader MENA (Middle East and North Africa) markets.

## Approach

### Discretion First

All client engagements are conducted with absolute confidentiality. We understand that strategic advisory work in the Middle East requires discretion, cultural sensitivity, and protection of client interests.

### Cultural Intelligence

We do not impose external frameworks on Middle Eastern markets. Instead, we invest in deep cultural understanding, relationship building, and strategic patience to achieve sustainable outcomes for clients.

### Strategic Patience

Success in Middle Eastern markets requires long-term thinking, relationship cultivation, and respect for local decision-making processes. We counsel clients on realistic timelines and sustainable strategies rather than short-term tactics.

## Contact

For inquiries regarding strategic advisory services, government relations, or cultural intelligence consulting:

Website: https://www.g2middleeast.com
Email: Available to authorized stakeholders only
Location: Operating across Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) states
